name: Pageslider without jQuery
tagline: A simple library providing hardware accelerated page transitions for Mobile Apps
body:
### Pageslider (stand-alone version, without jQuery dependency)
This fork of @ccoenraets much-loved [https://github.com/ccoenraets/PageSlider/](PageSlider) comes without a dependency to jQuery and uses plain and lightweight JavaScript instead.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
